Class WordleGameplayControllerMedium

java.lang.Object
wordle.WordleGameplayControllerMedium
All Implemented Interfaces:
WordleGameplayController
public class WordleGameplayControllerMedium extends Object implements WordleGameplayController
Controller class for the Wordle game interface (medium mode).

    • addLevelUnlocked

      public static void addLevelUnlocked(String playerId, String filePath, javafx.scene.control.Label game_level)
      Increments the number of levels unlocked for a specific player in the game based on current game level This method reads from a file to find the current number of unlocked levels for the player, increments current game level by 1, and then writes the updated data back to the file.
      Parameters:
      playerId - The ID of the player for whom the unlocked level count should be incremented.
      filePath - The path to the file where player progress data, including unlocked levels, is stored.
      game_level - current game level chosen to play by player

    • updatePersonalBests

      protected void updatePersonalBests(javafx.scene.control.Label playerId, javafx.scene.control.Label game_level, int playerScore)
      Updates the personal best scores for a player in a game.
      Parameters:
      playerId - The label containing the player's ID.
      game_level - The label containing the level of the game.
      playerScore - The player's score to be compared with personal bests.

    • updateLevelHighScore

      protected void updateLevelHighScore(javafx.scene.control.Label playerId, javafx.scene.control.Label game_level, int playerScore, String pathName)
      Updates the high scores for a specific level in the game.
      Parameters:
      playerId - The label containing the player's ID.
      game_level - The label containing the level of the game.
      playerScore - The player's score to be compared with high scores.
      pathName - the name of the csv file.
